reviews.reviewText: Super satisfied! Got everything that was in the description. Was skeptical at first, but it was totally worth buying, better deal than buying it a Best Buy or any other electronic store. Buying the camera itself was already $500+ and their bundles in store were $1000+ for the camera and EF 75-300mm lens, which cost $300 separate, a bundle not worth $1000.

$500 bundle and the 18-55mm lens refuses to autofocus. If I put the 300mm lens or any use one of the wide angle lenses in addition to the 18-55mm, it works fine. Only using the lens by itself does it act up. Researching shows me this is a junk lens and many people are having issues with it. 1 star for now until seller responds with a solution. For $500, I should be able to use my camera without hassle and this is only day 2 with it. Making me very nervous that a product at this price point can be so finnicky.

Jan 2nd Edit: Seller contacted me and told me to call Nikon "as it might be a setting issue". Super awesome since this is a Canon T6. Regardless, the camera works fine with my buddies STM lens and all of the other included lens' and I have factory reset the device and all settings back to default but the 18-55mm lens will not manual ot auto focus no matter the conditions.

Jan 2nd second edit:. Tried the "snap ring" trick and now it's focusing again. Not sure what to think of this lens but I ordered the STM lens just incase this is not a permanent fix. Updating to 3 stars as the camera and bundle is well worth the price. Removed 2 stars for customer service being below par and the fact the lens already had an issue.

I have been enjoying this new camera (it‚Äôs my new first camera), and so far I love it. Everything came well packaged and secured. It was really nice to see that everything came as it said it would (even in their own original new box). It was easy to access and use. Side note; if you do have trouble with understanding how to work your camera, googling videos on the camera type is super helpful. That‚Äôs how I was able to learn.
I did notice that some people were complaining about the stand, or how most of the stuff didn‚Äôt come, or the quality of the pictures were bad. All is not true. The stand is tall, it‚Äôs not short or hard to utilize. It really depends on your knowledge and level of cameras. It does take time to learn and practice. Everything does come as shown in images, you just have to put them together or do a checklist!

I have put everything I received into images and detailed the little accessory in case you didn‚Äôt get what you were suppose to get or if you need any of these items (in case it gets lost).

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Happy Owner of Canon EOS Rebel T6
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing camera. I took a lot of time in picking out a camera and finally settled on this one. I picked a real winner. I am already working in manual mode and learn so much each time I pick up the camera. The set comes with so many different things. I have not been able to use some of the lens or filers. I cannot say enough good things about this camera. If you are trying to decide don't hesitate with getting this camera, you will be happy you did.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wifi is an easy and useful feature
reviews.reviewText: The wifi option is the best feature!!! I can easily connect and transfer to my iPhone and then send to have printed or saved on Shutterfly. The pictures are so crisp and clear...I am very happy with this purchase. The camera is user friendly and any amateur (like myself) should be able to easily operate it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast shipping great camera, I am a photographer but wanted something ...
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping great camera, I am a photographer but wanted something that can be affordable and to use just for family pictures. I love the light weight of the camera and the accessories got you ready to go and take amazing pics. Great for students or new photographers or families with young children like me!

At first I was skeptical of this product given that some of the reviews said that there were product quality issues. I was extremely happy with the quality of all products. The tripod is easy to use and seems very sturdy. I was surprised by a smaller little tripod that I can‚Äôt wait to use. The Canon camera and lenses are a steal at this price! We are thinking about these kits as Christmas presents! Great purchase and we are pleasantly surprised!

I am going to live over in the UK for a year, so wanted to get a camera to try and force myself to take more pictures. I am not a picture type of guy when traveling or going to events, normally preferring to enjoy the moment. But I would like to capture some memories.

Anyways, I read a lot of reviews on different sites and decided to take the plunge with this camera. My thought process was that it seemed like a very solid camera, not necessarily the best at anything but solid at most things, and if I did get to the point where I am feeling limited my the camera, then it did its job and I could 'graduate' to a more expensive, more full-featured camera. If I do not get into photography as much as I think I will, then I am not out a ton of money.

The first thing you notice when you get this is just how much stuff it comes with. It is like Christmas. You open the camera, then the lenses, then the filters, then the accessories, and then more and more and more. It is great!

I read the entire manual before starting so I would have a good understanding of what all of the settings and buttons do. It seems intuitive enough as a point and shoot camera, but I wanted to make sure I knew the ins and outs in the beginning. Great manual, comprehensive and still easy to understand.

Finally, I have started taking photos and have been very pleased with the results. Again, I am not a photography expert, but it has done what I have expected it to do.

All in all, I would consider this a great purchase. This might not be for the experienced photographer (or maybe it is, what do I know), but it is perfect for me and I imagine it would be perfect for anybody looking to dip their toe into the world of photography before the wanted to commit to a seriosly expensive set of kit.

reviews.reviewTitle: so far am happy with the choice I made
reviews.reviewText: Brought this camera for my birthday, so far am happy with the choice I made.

Great camera, great images. Before i bought this camera i always read the reviews and i noticed there was people that put the extras were not worth it. My guess is that they dont know how to use them. For example the external flash, this flash does not connect onto the camera. Use the arm that comes with it, and when your cameras flash goes off the external goes off as well. It takes great pictures, you just need to know how to adjust the settings. By reading the manual or youtube.

I've had the camera for about two weeks now and it's been great! The automatic settings have produced some really good pictures, but I've also enjoyed experimenting with the different settings. I also love all of the accessories that this camera came with! Amazon had a bunch of bundle packs, but I settled with this one because of the 75-300mm lens which is included -- a super zoom lens which on it's own costs about $100. This bundle shipped very quickly and arrived with all of the accessories advertised. I haven't tried out all of the features included (such as the flash, telephoto and wide angle lens, and UV filters), but am excited to do so! I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone new to photography or someone looking to easily take high quality photos, and I would recommend this bundle in particular because of the bonus high quality lens included and the extra storage SD cards.

So long as you understand how to use a camera in general, this takes fantastic photos! I ordered it for wildlife photography and the zoom lens did an amazing job getting in there when I couldn't get close to the subject! I simply left it on all day, and the UV cap that came with it really made me feel safe about being on the ground with it! You get such clear photos, you can count the hairs on an armadillo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent starter camera. Some of the equipment is cheaply made.
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this as a starter DSLR. The camera takes some really nice pictures. There are soooo many features and settings that I'm still training myself on them and expect to remain self training for a good, long time. (there are books available to train more easily)
On the downside, the Vivitar lenses and the tripods are all low quality.... the lenses are alright for a total newbie like me but I'd definitely keep an eye out for replacements for each of the non-canon components. The tall tripod broke on first use and some of the Vivitar lenses do not attach to camera without a good deal of frustration for a lens that's supposed to be screw on. I took my first set of pics out in the wintry cold and the battery didn't handle it all that well. To be fair, it was Darn Cold. My cell phone battery also died from that chill.
For the price, it's an okay buy. I'm still shooting with it and that says something about the quality of the pics.
Overall, I'd recommend it as a good camera for the newbie. Buy your own QUALITY tripod though.

The camera itself is a great option in this price range for something solid which will give you a good number of options for nice pictures. Easy to work with, it has a battery which lasts a nice long time between charges. Full disclosure, I like the Canon brand and have always used their cameras. Complaints include issues with the wifi, accessories and shipping. The wifi is designed to connect to your phone, for viewing the pictures, period. No, it will not connect to any wifi and upload your pictures to the cloud, as I hoped, and the multiple software packages you must download are bulky and not user-friendly (and did not work with my Android phone). Mostly, I just connect the cable to my laptop and yank photos into my computer's hard drive. This accessory package includes some items of interest (multiple lenses) and some not, such as filters. The non-Canon items are alternately flimsy (table-top tripod) or difficult to use (two of the lens extenders don't thread well into the Canon lenses). I additionally had an issue with shipping. I waited "a good long time" for this to go on sale and then the shipper lost the item. I contacted the retailer, who replied "Upon reviewing your order details, I see that Amazon was the one that fulfilled and shipped your order, so it's solely in their hands to assist you with the package lost in transit." I contacted Amazon, who said "This is a third-party order. You must contact the seller to resolve delivery issues." I was furious. Bottom line: I would not order from this vendor again and I will not order expensive items from Amazon again if they are from a "third-party seller". Despite all the hassles, this is a decent camera and I am glad to own it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Expansive Kit for first-time DSLR owner
reviews.reviewText:
Love this camera and set so far. Don't know what I'll use everything for yet, but I'm excited to find out! I don't have much occasion to use the slave flash but that thing is legit. Lights up a room like a lightning strike and recharges incredibly quickly.
For someone just getting into DSLR photography, this a great kit. I would recommend that one be familiar with the basic settings available on a point and shoot (preferably of matching brand for easy transfer of knowledge) so that the transition doesn't feel quite so overwhelming. That being said, there's always trial and error, and when the photographs are digital, who cares how many times you have to try to get it right?

reviews.reviewTitle: Not happy with the pictures it takes.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera based on the fact that I really liked my previous Canon and also because it had really good reviews. I hate this camera and regret buying it. I have a lot of trouble getting the auto focus to act right and always use manual instead, the 'close up' setting does not in fact let you take very close up pictures, it doesn't take very true to color pictures and the pictures aren't as clear as my last camera of the same value and brand. This camera would probably be fine for taking pics on a vacation or family pics, but it is not good for what I wanted it for.

The hardest part of using this camera kit was fitting everything into the case! The camera is intuitive. A couple of minutes reading the manual is time well spent. I will enjoy spending years mastering the features, but for now, the auto functions make taking photos easy. The picture I posted was taken less than 1 hour after I put the battery into the camera. The lenses make getting good shots easy. I recommend this camera to anyone who wants to start taking better photos from day one.

reviews.reviewTitle: She is delighted with all the extras
reviews.reviewText: I bought it as a gift and it came well protected and two days early ,She is delighted with all the extras, She also found some excellent vids for this model on You Tube, It is new, so there are no books available now but probably will be soon .There are plenty available for the 6i and 6s.

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything in it is useful for good photography
reviews.reviewText: This bundle was well thought out. Everything in it is useful for good photography. The T6 speaks for itself as being a sophisticated, yet easy to use digital camera. Service was excellent. I am all set for some great photo adventures!

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera and all the accessories provided are very good. I liked the way it is bundled
reviews.reviewText:
The camera and all the accessories provided are very good. I liked the way it is bundled, choosing the various items. It's like a full course.
No need to mention the quality of the camera and lenses. They are already proven.

CAMERA
Camera is just fine actually pretty good. One thing is the panels on the camera can be a bit finicky.

THE BAG
The bag could be bigger but I've gotten everything to fit inside of it, though uncomfortably.

THE TRIPOD
The tripod broke within 2 uses. I do not recommend getting a tripod from Vivitar. Tripod is cheap and plastic and will break on you while in use which can potentially damage the very expensive camera. Screws of the tripod just decided to fall out and the handle moves way too easily, if moved to the left on accident (which is easily to do because it doesn't lock in place very well at all) the plate area becomes loose and the plate area will just fall and if a camera were to be on it, the camera would hit the legs of the tripod potentially damaging the camera. All the knobs of the tripod are also unsecure.
It's even better than I imagined, and the price was amazing. Beyond the doubt a GREAT DEAL

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera & extras for the price! You can't go wrong!
reviews.reviewText:
Just unboxed. So will update once I get camera up and running.
All items listed were in the box. I also received a single Digital Ultraviolet Filter along with the 3pc filter set. (The single Ultraviolet Filter I don't see listed above) Over all looks like great quality items!

This is my first DSLR camera so I am learning it slowly but I give it 4 stars for now until I learn how to use more of its features. It was easy to charge the battery and install it and load the SD card. So far I am just using the auto focus and mostly landscape mode because I have been taking picture outside. Love how good the pictures look and no shake at all even though I can see it is the image stabilization is working great. I think it is a great camera for a beginner.

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera and two Canon lenses are fine. However
reviews.reviewText:
The camera and two Canon lenses are fine. However, two parts of the bundle - the telephoto extended and tripod broke within 37 days. Other than the Canoncamera and lenses I believe all the products are of inferior quality. I even tried to return the whole bundle but the seller stated they had a 30 day return policy which I missed by 7 days. They did say, however, that the manufacturer of the two items mentioned above had a one year warranty. The bigger problem, as I see it, is that the bundle is described in such a way that one expects all the equipment to be as high in quality as the Canon products. This is not the case with this bundle.

I am not returning the two broken items because their replacements will be similarly low in quality.

Finally, I purchased this bundle entirely because of the price. Due to my experience with this bundle, however, I will never again buy any products using Amazon where quality is just as important, or even more important, than price.

As I write this review, I can‚Äôt believe how stupid I was. Next time I buy camera equipment from a camera store!

What a great bundle!! I purchased this as a gift...to myself and love it! This is a great camera for people that want to get into photography without spending thousands on their setup.
With all the extras that come with this bundle, you cannot go wrong!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Through reading articles on the internet and taking tons of pictures I get better every time I use it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera not knowing very much about them. Through reading articles on the internet and taking tons of pictures I get better every time I use it. I am very satisfied and enjoy using it. Everything was there as advertised and seemed to be of good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality canon camera kit at a good price
reviews.reviewText: The features on this camera are amazing. Direct wifi upload to flikr, remote control from my Samsung phone, speedy auto focus, aperature priority, and the included lenses, filters and adapters - all super useful for the budding hobbyist or suburban dad grabbing memories by the gig (high definition memories!)

This was a birthday gift for my daughter and let me tell you that she loves it,she couldn't stop smiling,she only asked for a camera and when she opened the box it was like Christmas for her.i am happy she is enjoying her new passion! Everything came packed in neatly and safe.it was cool that it came packed in a box in a box,because my daughter didn't know what to expect.

This was a Christmas present for my daughter. She's very very happy with it. She said it would take a while to learn how to use everything that came in the bundle but she's up to the challenge. The only down side is the camera bag. It's to small for everything that's in this bundle so I'll have to buy another one.

reviews.reviewerName: Take care of the earth it's our home üè°
reviews.reviewTitle: Would give a five but the card messed me for a week still outstanding price just foe camera and lenes
reviews.reviewText: Would buy one step up to 6it for 300 more many things will not be used great price so we are happy note a 10 card does not come with it no instructions in my box note down load on u tube for rating page 5 and your set

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera bundle at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Love this camera bundle! It has everything needed to get started using the camera. It‚Äôs a great value for the price. I would definitely recommend this camera to others.

Bought his package for a vacation trip. Camera and lenses all worked as they should. Only disappointments so far are the dealer included a cheap IR remote (no IR function on the camera) instead of the one advertised. Waiting to hear from them about this. The Canon Connect software has some issues that almost make it worthless, almost... No PC/Windows support. I prefer to WiFi transfer to a laptop for viewing, tuning, posting and printing.

reviews.reviewTitle: It was great until.it wasnt.... but not the cameras fault
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful camera and all the accessories. Unfortunately 3 weeks after getting it, our car caught on fire and the camera was lost. Insurance wont cover it. Saved a long time for this and it went up in flames. :-(

reviews.reviewTitle: May be an ENTRY level Camera...but it is a good one. and my first new canon in 47 years!
reviews.reviewText: Great camera...I have long been a NIKON user, but I have to say this relatively simple Canon is better..., especially for someone who has not struggled with a major in Photography. I know the bells and whistles...but This Canon Rebel T6 Digital Slr does the work for you. You get the results without having to program every detail yourself. Every camera has its strong points and its drawbacks. This one needs a slave flash..meaning you have to attach one (which comes in this bundle) It may be a little less convenient than built -in flash, but it is sometimes worth it to eliminate the glare of a close up flash, which wipes the fine details.Better yet, you can attach it to a tripod,(also included) to eliminate accidental movement, and take it without flash! Anyway, I like this camera for its ease of use, versatility, and most important because it takes great pictures. Check into the sellers bundle package-there are some useful items there

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality of camera and accessories. Reviews online and from friends were extremely important!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely amazing camera package! Trouble is, I think it's a whole lot smarter than me. I bought the "For Dummies" book to help me out. üòâ Also purchased an extra large bag to carry everything. Thanks!

I wrote a lengthy review yesterday about problems I was having with my rebel t6i but I think I failed to submit it.
Well I finally figured out that I could talk to a canon rep about tech assistance. After a lengthy call with them all of the so called problems are resolved. Thank god there is nothing wrong with my camera bcuz I love it!
One thing though- there was no large tripod included with the equipment. it is supposed to be included. If you could just send me a tripod I would appreciate it! Susan L Kosek 716-465-6506

As a beginner photographer, I was very intimidated to purchase a nice camera like this. However, it takes beautiful shoots and can be as beginner or advanced as your skills. I am extremely happy with this purchase and the accessories make for limitless creativity. Would recommend as a beginner or intermediate camera.

i'm very happy with my purchase, The only thing not thrilled wit, is the tripod. but,I'm used to a better one. it is about what I expected for a tripod in a pacage deal, and is quite functional. the non Cannon optics are Vivitar, which is a high quality brand. All in all great value

I still have a ton to learn. It might be easy to use for a DSLR but it's a lot to learn to use it well. That's not the cameras fault -- it's just the reality of entering this level of a skill I think.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceptional value as a DSLR starter package
reviews.reviewText:
Being used as a stepping stone into astrophotography. Recently attached camera to Newtonian Dobsonian and stacked and processed images in Deep Sky Stacker. Camera performace has exceeded my expectations.
Phot4Less processed my order efficiently and every item arrived in new and pristine condition. I will do business with them again in the future.

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. We have lots of fabulous pictures of the grandson‚Äôs sports! My son has a very expensive camera and lens from about 10 years ago and he couldn‚Äôt believe what a deal this is!

I chose this camera package because it claimed to come with a wide angle lens. Instead of a wide angle lens it's a lens converter. The photos taken with the wide angle converter have a circular halo. The photos with the telephoto lens and telephoto converter come out blurry. The filters don't thread properly onto the lenses. I wanted to take quality photos in Antarctica. I got better quality photos with my point and shot camera then the expensive Canon DSLR. I regret buying this camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was a fantastic bundle, perfect for my daughter's photography classes.
reviews.reviewText: This was a fantastic bundle, perfect for my daughter's photography classes. The only thing the bundle should have included is one of those lens blower things (which I purchased later separately).
Amazing value, exactly as advertised. I shopped around and this is one of those rare deals. I‚Äôd give 10‚≠êÔ∏è‚Äòs if I could.
I was looking for a decent camera for beginners and thus bundle more than fulfilled my list. I feel it is a good bang for your buck without being too superfluous.
Bought this for my wife for christmas, and so far she loves it. All of the acceressaries fit with the camera and everything was in its origional packaging. Made my christmas shopping super easy.

The camera itself it a good camera. The non-Canon lenses and accessories are very cheap. I would sudgest just buying the body and then buying quality accessories and lenses as you find the need for them.
At first, I thought this would be some sort of scam but, everything came according to the detailed list. The camera is a great starter for anyone.

Quality of small tripod in the bundle was surprisingly decent. Thumbs up.

One macro lenses was not constructed well or set properly/thoroughly completed. 300mm lense had a scratch on it, waiting to see what I can do with it to make it worth my time.

If you got through those minor details, this camera is great and works to specification. Good quality photos and easy to use/handle. 4 Stars.
So far so good. Excellen bye. When searching I found many bundles but not one as put together as this one. More bang for ur buck. Came w everything I needed

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the camera package and all of the accessories it comes with
reviews.reviewText: This is my first DSLR camera, but I've had another canon before, so my learning curve isn't so bad. I like it so far, ice only had it for a day, but I've taken some pictures already and like how it had come out. I've been practicing on my depth of field abilities and this camera makes it super easy to do, even in manual mode.
My daughter loves her gift. It came with so many extras. She's having fun in her photo journalism class, learning about what everything does. Spectacular purchase!
Great purchase, great value, prompt shipping. Very pleased and thrilled with this purchase. Accessories have already improved my pictures. Tripod is better than expected.

The canon pays for the money spent. The only Issues I had was with the accessories that came with the camera. The high def. Lens adapter broke 3 days after I had it, issues with the threading. The bag that came with camera the strap broke with in the first 10 days of owning it.
Been using it for a few months and I have been please with the camera and all of the extras that came with it. No complaints here.
great camera...one problem...it has no microphone jack for adding quality sound to movies pics.

reviews.reviewTitle: The price was amazing for the whole package of everything
reviews.reviewText: Fast one day shipment, The price was amazing for the whole package of everything . First time with SLR Camera and still learning how to use it. So far so good.
Easy to use. Have a little trouble focusing when using automatic focusing. But very happy with it overall. Like all the lens and accessories üòä
The camera and accessories are great. We are already using it take pictures of the Bluebonnets. It is very easy to use.

exactly whay was ordered
this was gifted for my daughter
for her birthday
she loves it
canon has a great product
and all the extras were worth the extra price

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent value, can't go wrong with Canon
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as specified in the package. Some items, like the USB card reader, aren't worth buying separately but for the price they were essentially free. Great starter package...the lenses, filters, and cam body are exactly what I was looking for to get back into SLR photography for cheap!

reviews.reviewTitle: she said that she's in love with the camera and she's looking and learning how ...
reviews.reviewText: That was a gift to my wife birthday, she said that she's in love with the camera and she's looking and learning how to use the camera, thanks again and hope to get more items from u guysüòâ

I was ready to give this lot 5 stars but I was really upset to learn that this is not all Canon products. There are Vivitar lenses and accessories. I would not have gotthis particular lot had they stated that.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don"t have to be a Professional
reviews.reviewText:
This camera is a gift will stay packed away until 12/25/2018
(it's unopened original sealed factory wrap)
The Rebel is for the professional but through hands on training you can learn to use the Rebel throuth self taught
I love the Sony Rebel. I've owned several, over the 16+ years I've been a Professional Photogpher
I Love Love Love My REBEL

reviews.reviewTitle: I received everything in the pic
reviews.reviewText: I received all the products listed in the picture. So far I love it. I am still learning how to work it as this is my first camera.
Still trying to figure out how to take regular pics, but it is perfect n I would recommend any one to get. It's also affordable

I never owned a camera at this level, simple to turn on and shoot and get nice pics. Once I learned how the settings worked it became easier to use. I am very pleased with the package and all that came with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great purchase. The camera comes with a lot of ...
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase. The camera comes with a lot of fun stuff to play around with your camera. Of course the accessories are cheap brands, but still fun to use. One of the accessories came damaged and the company replaced it right away! Would definitely buy from them again.

This is my wife's and my dream camera. We both enjoy how beautiful the pictures look and all of the peices that came with it were easy to use. If you are looking for a new camera then you're going to have to make this your choice.
This camera is just plain and simple great. All the accessories you need are in this combo pack

This package is AWESOME!!! I'm from Costa Rica and I have to say this package has everything I need to start taking awesome pictures. Price is excelent and as far as the pics they are awesome quality. I love this camera!!!! I'm so ready for the weekend to come so that I can take some great nature pictures using this camera. Package came exactly as advertised!!! Highly recommended!!
Purchased this camera as a gift for my adult daughter. She was greatly pleased and all accessories were included as stated.
What an amazing camera and this particular kit of extras is wonderful too. Such a great deal and our teen daughter was able to use it immediately (as soon as it was charged). Highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy a backup USB SD reader!!!
reviews.reviewText:
So far, so good. Camera is wonderful and accessories are useful...although the big tripod is plastic and rather rickety.

***BEWARE***: the Xit USB SD reader is a piece of junk, just check the reviews if you don‚Äôt believe me.

I have had this product for only 4 months and the camera no longer powers on. There is no option for return or refund. This is absolutely ridiculous. I have bought this camera before exactly and have not had this problem. I don‚Äôt know why this one is having issues. As I take very good care of my equipment. Don‚Äôt know if this is a faulty camera or faulty seller but there‚Äôs not even any options to make amends to this situation. I‚Äôm just out 500 bucks
Bought it for my daughter for Christmas , she loves it!
Love this camera. The camera takes great pictures. Easy to use. I have added leneses and filters. Great deal on this set.

With all the reviews I was reading of people saying that they weren‚Äôt getting everything in the packages they bought I was hesitant to buy this... however I still got it and I‚Äôm so happy I did because it came with everything I paid for!
The bundle was a great price! Easy to use and plenty of equipment to go with the camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Will buy again, when I upgrade.
reviews.reviewText: Everything arrived in perfect condition. Great price.
Loved it!

We knew we wanted to buy a Canon camera, and after researching for some time decided on this model. Spending quite some time on deciding what bundle to purchase, we decided on this one. We are truly satisfied with the camera and the lenses and filters that came with the camera. Even the carry bag. Professionally packaged, manual included, and just all round a feel of quality. We've taken some pictures by now, and we are amazed at the quality of the images, and ease with which the camera takes those great images. My wife has actually entered some in the local fair to compete with the much more seasoned professionals. The lost star of this bundle is due to the included tripod. It was a cheap item which broke during shipping, and is too cheap of an item to justify returning the bundle. Amazon did give us a nice cash refund, but my recommendation would be, buy a bundle without a tripod, and spend the money buying a decent tripod.

I did a lot of research as to which camera to buy. I chose the t6i because I felt it was the most compatible with someone like myself who is an amateur photographer. I also purchased my camera from photo for less because of the reviews I read about them. When I received my package it had everything they described. I was not disappointed with any of the items even tho there are a couple of things that are relatively cheap. The camera and two main lenses were my biggest concern and they are perfect. I did have a question about the other lenses. I contacted photo for less via email and not only got a quick response but an explanation as well. They even invited me to call and gave a phone number if I had any questions. Kudos to photo for less.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent camera kit for the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my daughter's wedding and took a bunch of pictures pre wedding. So I gave a used gift! However, it allowed me to see it's functionality and ease of use in video and still mode. The camera worked great in various lighting conditions and will provide years of memory preservation.

I haven't had a chance to use my new camera as of this date. I have put it together and I have practiced with it and tried the different levels. So far so good. I like to know that I have all the lenses and accessories.

reviews.reviewTitle: I had been a former user of film SLR back in the day and I think that this is an excellent choice for both beginners and seasone
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife as her first SLR and she loves the quality of the photos and versatility compared to the point and shoot she had used. I had been a former user of film SLR back in the day and I think that this is an excellent choice for both beginners and seasoned photogs. The 2 kit lenses are adequate and I supplemented them with a Canon 50mm which is very good. The extra goodies included in the package are nice, but they are somewhat low quality. The external flash is a Slave flash and pretty cheap in my opinion, but overall a good choice.

I'm not a professional photographer, or anywhere close to being a professional, but I do know how to use a camera, if it looks clear, take the picture and if it's not clear don't take it. I'm having so much fun with this camera, my pictures do look professional. One satisfied customer here for the price
